documentHelpersplatform
PropertySelection
Class defined in model/PropertySelection.js#20 inherits from

A selection which is bound to a property. Implements model/Selection.

Example
var propSel = doc.createSelection({
  type: 'property',
  path: ['p1', 'content'],
  startOffset: 3,
  endOffset: 6
});
